DOC.brief_summary: Collection of follow-up data from the original trial patient cohort.
DOC.brief_title: High-dose Chemotherapy With Hematopoietic Stem-cell Rescue for High-risk Breast Cancer: Long-term Follow-up
DOC.detailed_description: Collection of follow-up data from the original trial patient cohort by means of structured patient file abstraction, a questionnaire to the general practitioner, and registry consultations.
